bill.title: Customized living services providers standards establishment; long-term care consultation services for a resident's spouse or legal partner authorization; nursing facility rates definitions modifications; criteria for adequate nursing facility documentation expansion; payroll record requirements modification; confidentiality of nursing facility financial statements; requirements for accrued expense reimbursements establishment; scholarship per diems for nursing facility employees modification; adult foster care resident rule repeal

history.action: Referred to Aging and Long-Term Care Policy
